title: Patching issues
body:
Hello, at the previous patch i downloaded the game and got the problem of unspecified error occurred check logs and blah blah
I copied at my friends house his client and it worked fine at my home when I put his folders over mine.
this patch the same problem and no friend to help, and solution?

replies.body:
It's possible that your system isn't able to connect and grab files from the patching servers properly. I suggest working through our [patching issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), which goes over the most frequent fixes for this.

If you still have issues after working through that guide, let me know.
